name: Gplus Publisher
author: FranTorres

sections.description: The plugin puts the required code in the WITHOUT-AUTOR-pages of your blog (and JUST in them, is it supposed that in the with-autor-pages you have rel=”author” and rel=”me” codes to relate an author with a Google+ Profile) in order to get a “identified site” in reference to a Google+ Page.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to your plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enjoy!

short_description: Puts rel="publisher" code related to Google+ in the without-autor-pages of your blog.
description: The plugin puts the required code in the WITHOUT-AUTOR-pages of your blog (and JUST in them, is it supposed that in the with-autor-pages you have rel=”author” and rel=”me” codes to relate an author with a Google+ Profile) in order to get a “identified site” in reference to a Google+ Page.
